my dad is a dentist and my mom is a teacher.

My four daughters are my pride and joy.

content.text: Hey! How are you doing today?
Pretty good! Just finished making dinner, how about you?
Not bad, just got home from work. I love to cook too! What'd you make?
Made a big pot of chili. I love cooking while I watch football games.
That sounds delicious! I'm not much of a football fan, but I can appreciate good food.
Thanks! I'm not really a fan either, but I find the games pretty relaxing to watch while I cook.
I hear that. I'm more of a basketball fan myself.
Oh, really? Who's your favorite team?
I'm a big fan of the Golden State Warriors.
Nice! They're a great team. I'm a fan of the Chicago Bulls myself.
Oh, that's cool! I like the Bulls too. They've had some great players over the years.
Yeah, they have. I'm really excited to see how they do this year.
Me too! I think they have a good chance of making the playoffs.
I think so too. They've got a lot of talent on their team.
Yeah, they do. I'm looking forward to seeing how they do this season.
